problems.title: First Index of X (Recursive)
problems.description:
Given an array of N integers and a value X, find the first index where X appears using recursion. If X is not present, print -1. Indexing is 0-based.

Input Format:
First line: integer N.
Second line: N integers.
Third line: integer X.

Output Format:
Print the first index of X or -1 if not found.
hintsList: Start from index 0: if arr[0] == x return 0, otherwise recurse on subarray starting at 1 and adjust index if found.
